Package equipments.meter

Interface ElectricMeterImplementationI

All Known Subinterfaces:
ElectricMeterCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
ElectricMeter, ElectricMeterConnector, ElectricMeterInboundPort, ElectricMeterOutboundPort
public interface ElectricMeterImplementationI
The interface ElectricMeterImplementationI defines the services implemented by an electric meter component.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-09-19

Author:
Jacques Malenfant, Daniel SIMA
